body: After looking at a few chapters I have to say the wife wasn’t fateful to the husband which is really messed up
@Cemb77: Well said

@largeballs12: Are you blind? The wife was selfish needy woman with very little self control who started cheating on her husband way before she got any notion that he was involved in some shady shit. You don't cheat on a some1 you care about, and she constantly blames the husband for her own lack of control which shows can't even take basic responsibility for her own choices like a proper adult.  She also manipulated the delivery guy, using her body and got him go down a path that would lead to him being tortured and later killed. She is not a good person, no really is in this story but wife definitely gets her own spot. You talk shit about the red head but as crazy as she is compared to the wife she was loyal to the husband and never willingly offered her body to anyone but him. Red head was also willing to die for the husband something the wife never would do since she was only loyal to herself.
